note.p: Death: Shirenewton Hall, near Chepstow (10 March 1900)
Career: Helped to found the Royal Meteorological Society; made weather observations (1840-1882); wrote on the weather; an authority on the hybridization of plants, and on ferns
Memberships: FRAS; FLS; FGS; FZS; RMS; Corr Memb of the Lyceum of Nat Hist of New York; Corr Memb of Manchester Lit and Phil Soc; Hon Memb of the Dublin Nat Hist Soc
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 101-103 signed by M T M and W N S
Notes: Cert X 113 is dated February 1862;
Cert X 114 is dated January 1851: Baden Powell has signed twice; signature of J C Wright crossed out, with note 'by mistake, is a F of R Soc of Literature';
